name: describe_table
description:
Get the specified table resource by table ID.

This method does not return the data in the table, it only returns the table resource,
which describes the structure of this table. The response follows the BigQuery API
Table resource specification.

project_id.description: Required. Project ID of the requested table.

dataset_id.description: Required. Dataset ID of the requested table.

table_id.description: Required. Table ID of the requested table.

selected_fields.description:
Comma-separated list of table schema fields to return.
If unspecified, all fields are returned.

view.description:
Specifies the view that determines which table information is returned.
Values: 'BASIC', 'STORAGE_STATS', 'FULL'. Default is 'STORAGE_STATS'.

name: execute_query
description: Execute a SELECT query on the BigQuery database.

name: list_tables
description:
List all tables in the specified dataset.

This function lists all tables in the specified BigQuery dataset by loading the JSON DB file
and processing its contents. It returns a response structure that matches the BigQuery API
format, including pagination support and metadata about the tables.

project_id.description: Required. Project ID of the tables to list.

dataset_id.description: Required. Dataset ID of the tables to list.

max_results.description:
The maximum number of results to return in a single 
response page. If 0 or None, returns all tables. Leverage the page tokens to iterate 
through the entire collection.

page_token.description:
Page token, returned by a previous call, to request 
the next page of results.
